topics.body:

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a662b36368720518ed0000#post_53a662b36368720518ed0000
Ok, just let me apply the anesthetic *hits Squiggy with a frying pan* and we'll prep you for surgery. Nurse! Bring me my Jameson, staple gun and two, no three tubes of krazy glue! Also we're gonna need a lot of that glowing green goo!
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

"oh no doctor, we accidentaly attached the tentacles to his head"

(calls Rin Kaenbyou)

RANDY HUNGRY AGAIN!
*Eats all of GMA's spare arms*

"doctor, he is losing too much blood, and we ran out of krazy glue"
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body: (Great. I'm unconscious and about to die.)

Hongo: We can rebuild him, We have the technology

"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a6647c63687202ffa20100#post_53a6647c63687202ffa20100
Crap, time to improvise. *grabs cleaver off the wall* Just stuff something into the wound till I get back, and remember, no questions.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a664f663687203c59c0200#post_53a664f663687203c59c0200
[bq="SquiggyBomb"](Great. I'm unconscious and about to die.)[/bq]
Don't worry I got this!
*Carts him off into a empty room with nobody else but Rin Kaenbyou*
"Well that takes care of that.  Now to take care of the witnesses."
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body: *The Ultra Garrison arrive to assist me*
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a6656263687202a4010200#post_53a6656263687202a4010200


"yes doctor"

"quick, what do we have in here"

"uuuhugh, krazy glue bottles, dangerous medical instruments, biologically toxic garbage and gak"

"quick use the gak to cover the wounds and the garbage to soak the blood and try to cut those tentacles off"
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

*arrives just completely drenched in blood* Ok, I'm back, lets get to it- OH GODFUCKINGDAMMIT. Arms! I was supposed to get arms.

Ok... ok we'll have to make due, staple gun?
